actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-919.
Measure laid on table in House, S. J. Res. 89 passed in lieu.

official_title: A joint resolution permitting the supply of additional low enriched uranium fuel under international agreements for cooperation in the civil uses of nuclear energy, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-919) Declares that limits contained in agreements controlling transfers or exports from the United States of low enriched uranium shall not be construed to preclude transfers or exports in excess of such limits to nations which are parties to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

titles.title: A joint resolution permitting the supply of additional low enriched uranium fuel under international agreements for cooperation in the civil uses of nuclear energy, and for other purposes.
